item.title: My first attempt at creating a RSBot Script - xIronMiner (v0.5, Initial release)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I made a simple Iron power miner which mines at rimmington, I have never attempted to make a bot script before.
I removed the half made features from the script, the script is here so you guys can customise it to your own needs.
Save as [size=14pt]xIronMiner.java[/size]

[url=http://pastebin.com/icnF4DLk]0.1[/url] [url=http://pastebin.com/GyJr2axh]0.15[/url] (stable) [url=http://pastebin.com/ks70bRUJ]0.27[/url] (stable) [url=http://pastebin.com/qGfMVc5J]0.32[/url] (unstable, fixed some previous bugs and has some script optimizations) [url=http://pastebin.com/JBBGCBzm]0.35[/url] (unstable, added a GUI; leave options blank for now, not tested carefully) [url=http://pastebin.com/mYFMqFBk]0.45[/url] (unstable, banking has some bugs but 'Mine 1 Drop 1' is complete) [url=http://pastebin.com/bKsQ5jM5]0.5[/url] (stable, has banking in 3 locations)

The code below is for 0.5 (latest stable release).

[code=Java]import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.;
import java.awt.Graphics;
import javax.swing.*;

import org.rsbot.event.events.MessageEvent;
import org.rsbot.event.listeners.MessageListener;
import org.rsbot.event.listeners.PaintListener;
import org.rsbot.script.Script;
import org.rsbot.script.ScriptManifest;
import org.rsbot.script.methods.GrandExchange;
//import org.rsbot.script.methods.Skills;
import org.rsbot.script.wrappers.RSObject;
import org.rsbot.script.wrappers.RSTile;
import org.rsbot.script.wrappers.RSTilePath;

@ScriptManifest(
authors = { “xPure2” },
keywords = { “mining”, “banking”, “iron”, “pickaxes”, “xscripts” },
name = “xIronMiner”,
version = 0.5,
description = “The Universal Iron Miner. (now supports banking!)”
)

public class xIronMiner extends Script implements PaintListener, MessageListener {

private final ScriptManifest PROPS = getClass().getAnnotation(ScriptManifest.class);

private String status = "Loading...";
private String gMode = "Loading...";

private boolean Running = false;
private boolean guiWait = true;

public int Bank; //0 = Draynor, 1 = Varrock East, 2 = Varrock West
public int mode; //0 = Powermine, 1 = Mine 1 Drop 1, 2 = Bank
public final static int [] BOOTHID = {2213, 11402};

private int ironPrice;
private int loadsDone;
private int oresMined;
private int expGained;
private int startExp;
private int startLevel;
private int currentLevel;
private int levelsGained;
private final static int [] PICKAXE = {1265, 1267, 1269, 1271, 1273, 1275, 14099, 14107, 15259};
private final static int [] IRONROCKS = {9717, 9718, 9719, 11954, 11955, 11956};
//private final static int MININGANIMATION = 635;
private final static int IRONORE_ID = 440;

private long startTime;

//Banking
//Draynor
RSTile[] tilesToBankD = {new RSTile(2971, 3240), new RSTile(2975, 3237), new RSTile(2979, 3234), new RSTile(2983, 3233), new RSTile(2986, 3233), new RSTile(2992, 3232), new RSTile(2996, 3236), new RSTile(3001, 3239), new RSTile(3004, 3240), new RSTile(3010, 3241), new RSTile(3015, 3242), new RSTile(3022, 3242), new RSTile(3028, 3243), new RSTile(3034, 3246), new RSTile(3038, 3251), new RSTile(3040, 3255), new RSTile(3041, 3261), new RSTile(3047, 3265), new RSTile(3056, 3267), new RSTile(3061, 3270), new RSTile(3064, 3273), new RSTile(3067, 3275), new RSTile(3071, 3276), new RSTile(3074, 3272), new RSTile(3074, 3268), new RSTile(3076, 3265), new RSTile(3081, 3262), new RSTile(3081, 3259), new RSTile(3080, 3255), new RSTile(3081, 3254), new RSTile(3082, 3250), new RSTile(3085, 3245), new RSTile(3087, 3247), new RSTile(3092, 3248), new RSTile(3093, 3245)};
RSTilePath pathToBankD;

//Varrock East Bank
RSTile[] tilesToBankVE = {new RSTile(3286,3367), new RSTile(3283,3372), new RSTile(3286,3373), new RSTile(3290,3376), new RSTile(3294,3380), new RSTile(3292,3383), new RSTile(3291,3387), new RSTile(3291,3391), new RSTile(3292,3396), new RSTile(3290,3399), new RSTile(3290,3407), new RSTile(3288,3410), new RSTile(3285,3413), new RSTile(3285,3417), new RSTile(3285,3424), new RSTile(3281,3428), new RSTile(3278,3429), new RSTile(3273,3429), new RSTile(3267,3429), new RSTile(3262,3429), new RSTile(3256,3429), new RSTile(3253,3429), new RSTile(3253,3425), new RSTile(3253,3422), new RSTile(3253,3421)};
RSTilePath pathToBankVE;

//Varrock West Bank
RSTile[] tilesToBankVW = {new RSTile(3179,3371), new RSTile(3181,3372), new RSTile(3185,3374), new RSTile(3188,3375), new RSTile(3192,3375), new RSTile(3196,3375), new RSTile(3199,3375), new RSTile(3204,3375), new RSTile(3207,3377), new RSTile(3211,3380), new RSTile(3211,3384), new RSTile(3211,3388), new RSTile(3211,3392), new RSTile(3211,3399), new RSTile(3211,3403), new RSTile(3210,3408), new RSTile(3210,3415), new RSTile(3210,3420), new RSTile(3209,3427), new RSTile(3202,3429), new RSTile(3197,3429), new RSTile(3190,3431), new RSTile(3188,3433)};
RSTilePath pathToBankVW;

xIronMinerGUI xGUI = new xIronMinerGUI();

public boolean onStart(){
	if (game.isLoggedIn());
	log("xIronMiner Initialised.");
	startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
	startExp = skills.getCurrentExp(skills.MINING);
	startLevel = skills.getCurrentLevel(skills.MINING);
	ironPrice = grandExchange.getMarketPrice(IRONORE_ID);
	pathToBankD = walking.newTilePath(tilesToBankD);
	pathToBankVE = walking.newTilePath(tilesToBankVE);
	pathToBankVW = walking.newTilePath(tilesToBankVW);
	xGUI.setVisible(true);
	status = "xGUI Initialised";
	while(guiWait) sleep(500);
	return true;
}

@Override
public int loop() {
	TryRun();
	switch(mode){
	case 0: //Powermining
		if(inventory.isFull()){
			DropOres();
		} else {
			MineOres();
		}
		break;
	case 1: //Mine 1 Drop 1
		if (inventory.containsOneOf(IRONORE_ID)){
			status = "Dropping the ore.";
			inventory.dropAllExcept(PICKAXE);
		} else {
			MineOres();
		}
		break;
	case 2: //Banking
		if (inventory.isFull()){
			if (atBank()){
				doBank();
			} else {
				walk();
			}
		} else {
			if (atMine()){
				MineOres();
			} else {
				walkR();
			}
		}
		break;
	}
	return random(250, 500);
}

public void TryRun(){
	if (Running != true){
		if(!walking.isRunEnabled() && walking.getEnergy() > random(23,69)){
			walking.setRun(true);
			Running = true;
			status = "Turning on running.";
		}
	}
}

public void DropOres(){
	status = "Dropping all ores.";
	inventory.dropAllExcept(PICKAXE);
	loadsDone++;
}

public void MineOres(){
	if (walking.getEnergy() == 0){
		Running = false;
	}
	status = "Finding rock.";
	RSObject iron = objects.getNearest(IRONROCKS);
		if (iron != null && getMyPlayer().getAnimation() == -1) {
			status = "Mining ores.";
			iron.doAction("Mine");
			if (random(1, 8) == 4){
				status = "Antiban.";
				Antiban();
			}
		}
	}

private boolean atBank(){
	RSObject bank = objects.getNearest(BOOTHID);
	if (bank != null){
		if (bank.isOnScreen()){
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}

private boolean atMine(){
	RSObject rock = objects.getNearest(IRONROCKS);
	if (rock != null){
		if (rock.isOnScreen()){
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}

private void doBank(){
	if(bank.isOpen()){
		bank.depositAllExcept(PICKAXE);
		sleep(800, 1350);
	} else {
		bank.open();
		sleep(1750, 2200);
	}
}

private void walk(){
	switch(Bank){
		case 0:
			status = "Walking to Draynor Bank.";
			pathToBankD.traverse();
			break;
		case 1:
			status = "Walking to Varrock East Bank.";
			pathToBankVE.traverse();
			break;
		case 2:
			status = "Walking to Varrock West Bank.";
			pathToBankVW.traverse();
	}
}

private void walkR(){
	switch(Bank){
		case 0:
			status = "Walking to the Rimmington Mine.";
			pathToBankD.reverse();
			pathToBankD.traverse();
			pathToBankD.reverse();
			break;
		case 1:
			status = "Walking to the Varrock East Mine.";
			pathToBankVE.reverse();
			pathToBankVE.traverse();
			pathToBankVE.reverse();
			break;
		case 2:
			status = "Walking to the Varrock West Mine.";
			pathToBankVW.reverse();
			pathToBankVW.traverse();
			pathToBankVW.reverse();
			break;
	}
}

public void messageReceived(MessageEvent e) {
    String serverMessage = e.getMessage().toLowerCase();
    if (serverMessage.contains("you manage to mine")){
    	oresMined++;
    }
}

private void Antiban(){
	int r = random(0, 20);
	
	switch(r){
		case 3:
			mouse.moveSlightly();
			sleep(300, 700);
			break;
		case 7:
			camera.setNorth();
			break;
		case 9:
			mouse.moveRandomly(13, 43);
			break;
		case 16:
			mouse.moveOffScreen();
			sleep(1000, 2000);
			break;
		case 19:
			camera.moveRandomly(random(800, 1250));
			break;
	}
}

public void onFinish(){
    log("Thank you for using " + PROPS.name() + " v" + PROPS.version() + ".");
}

@Override
public void onRepaint(Graphics g) {
	//Run time counter
	long millis = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
	long hours = millis / (1000 * 60 * 60);
	millis -= hours * (1000 * 60 * 60);
	long minutes = millis / (1000 * 60);
	millis -= minutes * (1000 * 60);
	long seconds = millis / 1000;
	
	//Exp gained
	expGained = skills.getCurrentExp(skills.MINING) - startExp;
	
	//Current Level
	currentLevel = skills.getCurrentLevel(skills.MINING);
	
	//Levels gained
	levelsGained = currentLevel - startLevel;
	
	//Exp / h
	float expSec = 0;
	if ((minutes > 0 || hours > 0 || seconds > 0) && expGained > 0){
		expSec = ((float) expGained)/(float)(seconds + (minutes*60) + (hours*60*60));
	}
	float expMin = expSec * 60;
	float expHour = expMin * 60;
	
	//Ores / h
	float oresSec = 0;
	if ((minutes > 0 || hours > 0 || seconds > 0) && oresMined > 0){
		oresSec = ((float) oresMined)/(float)(seconds + (minutes*60) + (hours*60*60));
	}
	float oresMin = oresSec * 60;
	float oresHour = oresMin * 60;
	
	//Profit / h
	float profSec = 0;
	if ((minutes > 0 || hours > 0 || seconds > 0) && oresMined > 0){
		profSec = ((float) oresMined)/(float)(seconds + (minutes*60) + (hours*60*60));
	}
	float profMin = profSec * 60;
	float profHour = profMin * 60;
	
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 150));
	g.fillRect(9, 347, 484, 109);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial Black", 0, 18));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("xIronMiner", 11, 363);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial Black", 0, 14));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("v" + PROPS.version(), 124, 363);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("Runtime: " + hours + ":" + minutes + ":" + seconds, 11, 378);
	/*g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("Time to level: ", 11, 390);*/
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("Current Level: " + currentLevel + "(" + levelsGained + ")", 11, 402);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("Status: " + status, 11, 415);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("Mined ore: " + oresMined, 352, 378);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("Mined ore / h: " + (int)oresHour, 352, 390);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("EXP Gained: " + expGained, 352, 402);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("EXP Gained / h: " + (int)expHour, 352, 415);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("Profit: " + (oresMined*ironPrice), 11, 427);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 12));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("Profit / h: " + (int)profHour, 11, 440);
	g.setFont(new Font("Arial", 0, 13));
	g.setColor(new Color(0, 0, 0, 176));
	g.drawString("Mode: " + gMode, 352, 363);
}

class xIronMinerGUI extends JFrame {
	public xIronMinerGUI() {
		initComponents();
	}

	private void startButtonActionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
		String xMode = modeSelected.getSelectedItem().toString();
		String xBank = bankSelected.getSelectedItem().toString();
		if (xMode.equals("Powermine")){
			mode = 0;
			gMode = "Powermine";
		} else if (xMode.equals("Mine 1 Drop 1")){
			mode = 1;
			gMode = "Mine 1 Drop 1";
		} else {
			mode = 2;
			gMode = "Banking | ";
		}
		if (xBank.equals("Draynor")){
			Bank = 0;
			gMode = gMode + "Draynor";
		} else if (xBank.equals("Varrock East")){
			Bank = 1;
			gMode = gMode + "Varrock East";
		} else {
			Bank = 2;
			gMode = gMode + "Varrock West";
		}
		guiWait = false;
		xGUI.dispose();
	}

	@SuppressWarnings("unused")
	private void initComponents() {
		// JFormDesigner - Component initialization - DO NOT MODIFY  //GEN-

		//BEGIN:initComponents
		// Generated using JFormDesigner Evaluation license - John fddf
		bankSelected = new JComboBox();
		modeSelected = new JComboBox();
		startButton = new JButton();
		label2 = new JLabel();
		label3 = new JLabel();

		//======== this ========
		setTitle("xIronMiner GUI");
		Container contentPane = getContentPane();

		//---- bankSelected ----
		bankSelected.setModel(new DefaultComboBoxModel(new String[] {
			"Draynor",
			"Varrock East",
			"Varrock West"
		}));

		//---- modeSelected ----
		modeSelected.setModel(new DefaultComboBoxModel(new String[] {
			"Powermine",
			"Mine 1 Drop 1",
			"Bank"
		}));

		//---- startButton ----
		startButton.setText("Start");
		startButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			@Override
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				startButtonActionPerformed(e);
			}
		});

		//---- label2 ----
		label2.setText("Banking");

		//---- label3 ----
		label3.setText("Mode");

		GroupLayout contentPaneLayout = new GroupLayout(contentPane);
		contentPane.setLayout(contentPaneLayout);
		contentPaneLayout.setHorizontalGroup(
			contentPaneLayout.createParallelGroup()
				.addGroup(contentPaneLayout.createSequentialGroup()
					.addGroup(contentPaneLayout.createParallelGroup()
						.addGroup

(contentPaneLayout.createSequentialGroup()
							.addContainerGap()
							.addGroup

(contentPaneLayout.createParallelGroup()
								.addComponent(label3)
								.addComponent(label2))
							.addGap(40, 40, 40)
							.addGroup

(contentPaneLayout.createParallelGroup(GroupLayout.Alignment.LEADING, false)
								.addComponent(bankSelected, 0, 

GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, Short.MAX_VALUE)
								.addComponent(modeSelected, 0, 

GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, Short.MAX_VALUE)))
						.addGroup

(contentPaneLayout.createSequentialGroup()
							.addGap(63, 63, 63)
							.addComponent(startButton)))
					.addContainerGap(GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, 

Short.MAX_VALUE))
		);
		contentPaneLayout.setVerticalGroup(
			contentPaneLayout.createParallelGroup()
				.addGroup(contentPaneLayout.createSequentialGroup()
					.addContainerGap()
					.addGroup(contentPaneLayout.createParallelGroup

(GroupLayout.Alignment.BASELINE)
						.addComponent(label3)
						.addComponent(modeSelected, 

GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE, GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE))
					.addPreferredGap(LayoutStyle.ComponentPlacement.RELATED)
					.addGroup(contentPaneLayout.createParallelGroup

(GroupLayout.Alignment.BASELINE)

	// JFormDesigner - Variables declaration - DO NOT MODIFY  //GEN-BEGIN:variables

}[/code]

My basic paint, version 1 (only used in 0.27) (ores/h and ores mined doesn’t show properly & some text is not visible because it is not finished, ie profit, profit/h); turn off all the chatbox modifiers to view the paint properly.

Paint version 1.5 (since v0.32) (fixed some bugs so more labels are visible, profit & profit/h is still bugged along with TTL)

Things to do:

[ul][li]Finish my running method.[/li]
[li]Add a better antiban method, 1/4 chance of a antiban method occuring. (complete will be released with 0.35, also used in 0.32)[/li]
[li]Add banking. (Draynor village & Falador)[/li]
[li]Add specialist support for certain areas. (Rimmington & Falador Mines)[/li]
[li]Add paint. (check known bugs)[/li]
[li]Add a GUI. (fully complete since version 0.5)[/li][/ul]

Mining modes:

[ul][li]Powermine[/li]
[li]Mine 1 Drop 1 (complete since 0.5)[/li]
[li]Banking[/li][/ul]
(Full support for Draynor, Varrock west & Varrock east)

Known bugs:

[ul][li]Profit and Profit/h on the paint is not functioning correctly, this is due to an error in the RSBot engine. (due fix, when rsbot takes time in fixing their client)[/li]
[li]The runtime timer doesn’t stop when the script is paused, this is easy but I will add it later on when I am bothered (due fix, version 0.5)[/li][/ul]

[size=12pt]Current status: Testing[/size]

Ideas are appreciated along with constructive criticism, after this script I am going to create many more scripts and they will be exclusive to our community untill the last update.

Read full topic
item.source: My first attempt at creating a RSBot Script - xIronMiner (v0.5, Initial release)
